description: Target object gains the broken condition for the duration of the spell. Attended objects receive a body save. Broken Item is a Tier 2 condition. Items with the broken condition give a -3 to any checks or stats the item gives
name: Break
help: Gives an item the Broken condition

description: The target of this spell effect must make a body save or have their DR lowered by %mult%%EMM%;%lvlmh%%/mult% for the duration of this spell
name: Penetrating
help: Decreases target's DR. The amount of DR lowered increased per spell level past the first

description: Creatures of the selected type take a %mult%-1;%amm%%/mult% to attack and damage against the target. Creatures of the designated type receive a Body save to ignore this effect each time they attack a target under the effects of this keyword
name: Protection
help: Protects the target from a chosen type of creature

description: Manifest a Physical Barrier with: %opt%%mult%5;%add%%lvl%;1%/add%%/mult%:+:HP;%add%%EMM%;%lvl%%/add%:%EMMh%:DR;%amm%%/opt%. Any damage absorbed by this DR takes away from the barrier's HP pool
name: Barrier
help: Creates a Physical Barrier that blocks damage

description: Gives the target a save (Enchantment and Illusion give Mind, Necromancy Body) or gain the Frightened condition. Frightened is a Tier 2 condition that is a fear effect that causes a character to be terrified and have Defensive Reduction 2 (AC,CMD,Saves)
name: Frightened
